preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored CreateTable for LHD_SCHEDULED_ASSIGNMENT as table already exists.

createTable.remarks: Information pertaining to scheduled assignment for an LHD.

column.name: MACHINE
column.remarks: A reference to the machine that this scheduled assignment applies.

column.name: STATUS
column.remarks: The status of the LHD Scheduled Assignment.

column.name: GOAL_TYPE
column.remarks: The type of goal being references DUMP, LOAD or INVERSION.

column.name: GOAL_REF
column.remarks: This is a reference to the associated goal.

column.name: CREATION_TIME
column.remarks: The date that the Scheduled LHD Assignment was created.

column.name: TRIGGER_TIME
column.remarks: The date that the Scheduled LHD Assignment should be enacted.

column.name: CYCLE_OID
column.remarks: This is a reference to the associated cycle.

changeSet.author: MineStar

preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored AddForeignKeyConstraint for LHD_SCHEDULED_ASSIGNMENT_FK1 to table LHD_SCHEDULED_ASSIGNMENT as (1) the source or referenced column does not exist, or (2) the foreignKey already exists.

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM LHD_SCHEDULED_ASSIGNMENT WHERE MACHINE IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM MACHINE WHERE MACHINE.MACHINE_OID = LHD_SCHEDULED_ASSIGNMENT.MACHINE)
